snippet: The artist Jim Hodges is the subject of a career retrospective, “Give More Than You Take,” at the Institute of Contemporary Art in Boston.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews Jim Hodges: Give More Than You Take retrospective at Institute for Contemporary Art/Boston.
lead_paragraph: The artist Jim Hodges is the subject of a career retrospective, “Give More Than You Take,” at the Institute of Contemporary Art in Boston.
